question: The Grestest Love Songs of All Time came out just before Barry Manilow started to play at a hotel owned by who?
context:
The Greatest Love Songs of All Time is an album by Barry Manilow released on January 26, 2010. The release came not too long before the start of his new show at the Paris Las Vegas hotel.

Paris Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada. It is owned and operated by Caesars Entertainment Corporation.
